document_title: Acute appendicitis: Causes, signs and prevention
subsection_content:
Acute appendicitis cannot be prevented. This condition can occur when a piece of food, stool or foreign object gets stuck in an organ, causing irritation or infection. Bacteria grow rapidly, leading to infection.
The Center for Gastrointestinal Endoscopy and Surgery (Tam Anh General Hospital, Ho Chi Minh City) and the Department of General Surgery (Tam Anh General Hospital, Hanoi) are prestigious medical centers specializing in Gastroenterology, providing medical examination services. and advanced, effective treatment for patients with mild to severe liver problems (fatty liver, acute and chronic hepatitis, cirrhosis, liver cancer...). Tam Anh General Hospital system brings together a team of highly specialized and experienced Internal Medicine - Surgery - Gastrointestinal Endoscopy doctors, in addition to the support of a modern medical equipment system imported from abroad. in addition, serving the maximum examination and treatment needs of customers.
